Start Engineering Change¶

A mask in which new engineering changes can be created from templates is called up via Products ‣ Engineering Changes ‣ New from Template.

These templates take into account different maturities and complexities of the product to be modified. After selecting a template, this is confirmed with the New from Template button.

Now the Cause and Source of the engineering change are entered. The engineering change is created by clicking New from Template.
